titles: Good work for a good magistrate or, a short cut to great quiet. By honest, homely plain English hints given from Scripture, reason, and experience, for the regulating of most cases in this Common-wealth. Concerning religion; mercie; justice. By H.P.
author: Peters, Hugh, 1598-1660.
publisher: Printed by William Du-Gard printer to the Council of State,
